WorkItem.Description:
I have a hunter (Separine@Malorne@EU) where the DPS calculation is very worse.
In addition for example the best ITEM for the back ist one with 52 crit 69 INT (138dps) rather then the one with 105AP+90AGI.
I suspect, that the calculation ist based on INT and not on AGI+AP and for MM-Hunter Talent additional percentage of INT.
Â 
I hope you can correct this behavior.

Comments.Message:
1) No Buffs (besides self-buffs)
2) No Pet Talents
3) No Pet Buffs
4) No usage of Aspect of the Viper, therefore you are running oom 24% into the fight and losing 76% of your DPS.

It wants a larger mana pool and considerably more regen



** Closed by Jothay 1/27/2010 8:20 AM

I am allwas calculatung self buffed cause i have seldom 25raids
BTW, in a 5min figth I use a Mana potion instead Viper

I am missing a comment about the Equip, that I mentioned. So I am postin real Data:

For the Back will do 137 DPS the "Drape of the Violet Tower"
----
Back
177 Armor
+69 Stamina
+69 Intellect
Blue Socket
Socket Bonus: +5 Spell Power
Requires Level 80
Item Level 264 
Equip: Improves critical strike rating by 52 (1.13% @ L80).
Equip: Restores 30 mana per 5 sec.
Equip: Increases spell power by 97 
----

Very less DPS is the more Huter like Back with 126 DPS: "Recovered Scarlet Onslaught Cape"
----
Back
177 Armor
+90 Agility
+90 Stamina
Blue Socket
Socket Bonus: +4 Agility
Requires Level 80
Item Level 264 
Equip: Improves critical strike rating by 60 (1.31% @ L80).
Equip: Increases attack power by 105.
Equip: Increases your armor penetration rating by 52 (3.72% @ L80).
-----

I think the calculation is not correct for a MM Hunter.
BTW, Is there no import for the current Pet ?

I already answered why it wants to use an Int item over an agility one, you are losing SEVENTY SIX PERCENT of your DPS because you are going OOM, it wants a bigger mana pool and/or more mana regen so you don't lose so much DPS.

No, there is no import for current pet, I'm working on this process.
